sources.title: Hep Mother Hubbard (1956)
sources.description: To the tune of rhyme and music, a puppy eats Mother Hubbard out of house and cupboard and goes off to seek his fortune and make amends. He meets many nursery-rhyme characters along the way. And his appetite grows larger. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/hep-mother-hubbard-1956/

metadata.Plot: To the tune of rhyme and music, a puppy eats Mother Hubbard out of house and cupboard and goes off to seek his fortune and make amends. He meets many nursery-rhyme characters along the way. And his appetite grows larger.
